casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

December 8, 2006

[Cite as 12/8/2006 Case Announcements #2, 2006-Ohio-6466.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2006-1944. A. Schulman, Inc. v. Wilkins.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2004-B-370. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal and cross-appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals.

It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that briefing in this case is stayed until further order of the court.
